question: What are the office working hours?
answer: Our office hours are 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, Monday to Friday.

question: How do I apply for leave?
answer: Submit a leave request in the HR portal and get approval from your manager.

question: Who do I contact for IT support?
answer: Email support@company.com or call extension 1234 for IT support and more details.

question: How do I reset my password?
answer: Use the 'Forgot password' link on the login page to reset your password.And then Enter your new user_ID and password

question: How do I access the company VPN?
answer: Install the company VPN client and use your corporate credentials; see the VPN guide in Knowledge Base.

question: What is the dress code?
answer: Business casual Monday to Thursday; casual on Fridays.

question: How do I apply for a business travel request?
answer: Fill the travel request form and get manager approval before booking.

question: What is the holiday policy?
answer: Public holidays are observed as per the company calendar; check the HR portal for specifics.

question: How do I update my bank details?
answer: Update your bank details in the payroll section of the HR portal.

question: Where can I find company policies?
answer: Company policies are available in the intranet under 'Policies'.

question: How do I report harassment?
answer: Contact HR or use the anonymous reporting form on the intranet.

question: Is remote work allowed?
answer: Remote work depends on team policy. Check with your manager.

question: How do I request equipment?
answer: Raise an equipment request ticket through IT service desk.

question: How do I access my payslip?
answer: Payslips are available in the payroll section of the HR portal.

question: What is the probation period?
answer: The standard probation period is 3 months unless specified otherwise.

question: Can I work flexible hours?
answer: Flexible hours can be arranged with manager approval and depending on role.

question: How do I update my profile picture?
answer: Go to your profile on the intranet and click 'Edit profile'.

question: How are performance reviews conducted?
answer: Performance reviews are conducted twice a year; your manager will share details.

question: How do I set up email on my phone?
answer: Follow the mobile email setup guide in the IT help center.

question: Who do I contact for payroll issues?
answer: Contact payroll@company.com for payroll-related queries.

question: what should i do if i can't login
answer: If you cannot log in, try using the 'Forgot Password' option or contact IT support at support@company.com.

answer: Go to your device's Wi-Fi settings and connect to the company network using your employee credentials.

question: when is salary credited
answer: Salary is usually credited on the last working day of every month. Contact payroll@company.com for more details.

question: help me set up the environment
answer: To set up your working environment, install required software, connect to the company network, and log in to the employee portal. For technical setup, contact IT support.

question: how do i request for holidays
answer: You can request holidays by raising a leave application through the HR portal. Choose your leave dates, add a reason, and wait for manager approval.

question: how many leaves are allowed
answer: Leave count varies by company policy. Check the HR portal under the 'Leave Policy' section for your total annual leaves.

question: how do i apply for holidays
answer: To apply for holidays, log in to the HR portal, go to Leave Section, choose your dates, and submit a request for approval.

question: how do i check my leave balance
answer: You can check your leave balance in the HR portal under the 'Leave Balance' or 'My Leaves' section.

question: help me with leave request
answer: Sure! Open the HR portal, go to 'Leave Section', select your dates, and submit the leave application. Your manager will review it.

question: where do i see holiday list
answer: The holiday list is available on the HR portal under the 'Holiday Calendar' section.

question: how do i contact manager
answer: You can find your manager’s contact details in your employee profile on the HR portal or contact them via your official communication platform.

question: how do i download payslip
answer: Go to the HR portal, open the Payroll or Payslip section, select the month, and download your payslip in PDF format.

question: where can i see my attendance
answer: Your daily and monthly attendance details can be viewed under the 'Attendance' section of the HR portal.

question: how do i update my personal details
answer: You can update your phone number, address, and emergency contacts from the 'My Profile' section on the HR portal.

question: how do i change my phone number
answer: Go to your profile settings in the HR portal and edit the phone number field. Save the changes when done.

question: how do i update my email address
answer: Email updates usually require admin approval. Raise a request through HR support or contact IT for help.

question: how do i raise support ticket
answer: You can raise an IT or HR support ticket from the service desk portal by selecting issue category and submitting a description.

question: whom should i contact for help
answer: For HR queries, contact hr@company.com. For IT issues, email support@company.com. I can also guide you with basic issues.

answer: You can reach HR through the HR portal or email them directly at hr@company.com for quick assistance.

question: i need to talk to it support

question: how do i apply for work from home
answer: Work-from-home requests can be submitted through the HR portal under the Work Arrangement section. Your manager must approve the request.

question: how do i get my experience letter
answer: Experience letters are provided by HR. Raise a request through the HR portal or email hr@company.com.

question: how do i get my joining letter
answer: You can download your joining letter from the HR portal under the Documents or Onboarding section.

question: what should i do on my first day
answer: On your first day, report to HR for onboarding, collect your ID card, set up your system, and meet your reporting manager.

question: my salary is delayed
answer: If your salary is delayed, please wait for official communication or contact payroll@company.com for clarification.

question: how do i regularize my attendance
answer: Attendance regularization can be done through the Attendance section in the HR portal by selecting the date and submitting a reason.

answer: You can update your emergency contact details in your profile section on the HR portal.

question: where do i upload documents
answer: You can upload required documents in the HR portal under the Documents Upload or Profile Verification section.

question: how do i connect to vpn
answer: Install the company VPN client, use your employee login credentials, and follow the setup guide provided in the IT help section.

question: my vpn is not connecting
